channel.title: Luis Quintanilla - overcast
channel.description: All content tagged with 'overcast' by Luis Quintanilla

item.title: Congratulations on ten years of Overcast
item.description:
I no longer have an iPhone, but whenever anyone asks for a podcast app recommendation, Overcast is the first one I mention. Congrats on 10 years. Here's to many more.

]]>
